text:
Crowded Office

Crowded staircase, stifling heat, anxious Raskolnikov  
A heavy atmosphere surrounds him.  
Raskolnikov: “What is it?”  

Clerk: “You are a student?”  
Raskolnikov: “Yes, formerly a student.”  
Clerk: “Go to the head clerk.”  

---  

Small, packed room, better-dressed people  
Tension hangs in the air.  
Raskolnikov: “Why is everyone so indifferent?”  

Raskolnikov: “I need answers!”  
Two ladies exchange worried glances.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov navigates a crowded, stifling office filled with indifferent clerks and a sense of impatience.
